Package br.com.concepting.framework.util

Class StringUtil

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.util.StringUtil
public class StringUtil extends Object
Class responsible to manipulate strings.

    • indent

      public static <R extends BaseIndent> String indent(String value, Collection<R> rules) throws IOException, NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, InstantiationException
      Indents a string based on a list of indentation rules.
      Type Parameters:
      R - Class that defines the indentation rule.
      Parameters:
      value - String that will be used.
      rules - List that contains the indentation rules
      Returns:
      Indented string
      Throws:
      IOException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
      InstantiationException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
      InvocationTargetException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
      IllegalAccessException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
      NoSuchMethodException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
